蟡字的基本解释

蟡
guǐ
古书上说的一种像蛇的水中动物。

蟡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》過委切，上紙，見。］
［《廣韻》於爲切，平支，影。］
传说中涸川之精。

蟡字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟡； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1097第09
【唐韻】過委切【集韻】古委切，?音詭。【類篇】涸水之精曰蟡。【管子·水地篇】涸川之精者生于蟡。蟡者，一頭而兩身，其形若蛇，其長八尺。　又【玉篇】於爲切。義同。

蟡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蟡字的起名意思

暂无。

蟡
Basic explanation of words
蟡
guǐ
An aquatic animal that looks like a snake in ancient books.
蟡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǐ］
["Guangyun" has been cut, put on paper, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Weiqi, flat branch, shadow. ]
The essence of the legendary Jianchuan.
蟡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟡; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1097 Page 09
[Tang Yun] Gu Weiqie [Jiyun] Ancient Weiqie, sound tricky. 【Classes】The essence of Jianshui is called 蟡. [Guanzi·Shuidi Chapter] The essence of Jianchuan was born in 蟡. The scorpion has one head and two bodies, its shape is like a snake, its length is eight feet.　[Jade articles] Yu Weiqi. The same meaning.
